episodes.title: An Inaugural Podcast
episodes.description: The first podcast the cast ever records, they talk about preshow anxiety, the McCollough Effect and some life stories.

episodes.title: Laser Shooting Robot
episodes.description: The group talks about laser shooting robots, the EA controversy, and some of their favcrite video games from the past

episodes.title: Grace's Secret Murder
episodes.description: The group talks about getting offered drugs, non-threatening people banging on cars, and Grace's childhood murder attempt.

episodes.title: The First Kiss Conundrum
episodes.description: The group talks about first kisses, awkward dates, and saying things ironically.

episodes.title: Moving, Millennials, and Mice, Oh My!
episodes.description: The group talks about moving out of vermin infested apartments, things millenials have ruined, and the future of shopping at woodmans.

episodes.title: Snapchat Streaks Galore!
episodes.description: The group talks about Karma, practical christmas gifts, snapchat streaks, and more.

episodes.title: The Breakfast Club
episodes.description: The group talks about the Logan Paul situation, drunk people, breakfast, and high school detention.

episodes.title: College Hi-jinks
episodes.description: The group talks about scam phone calls, college hi-jinks, and terrifying childhood experiences.

episodes.title: Psychological Warfare
episodes.description: The group talks about using the Andy Griffith Theme for psychological warfare, awkward introductions, and spiders.

episodes.title: Weezer versus Panic!
episodes.description: The group talks about seeing live music, a crazy cat-napper, and the comment question of the day!

episodes.title: Fiddler Crab Fight Club
episodes.description: The group talks about interviews, underground crab fight clubs, and the pettiest things they've done.

episodes.title: Razor Scooters: Millenial Death-Traps
episodes.cast: Grace, Ash, Levi, Sam, and Guest Evan
episodes.description: The group talks about razor scooters and their ankle breaking tendencies, passing out, the sophomores, and concert struggles.

episodes.title: Levi the Fire Guy
episodes.description: The group talks about online storage sabotage, Levi's college fire alarm knowledge, and the best furry family members.

episodes.title: The Symbiotic Spider Sacrifice
episodes.description: The group talks about symbiotic relationships with spiders, experiences with snakes and coyotes, and memories of being young and dumb.

episodes.title: Fight the Cast With the Gals
episodes.description: The group fights with each other over cell phone voice mail, musical taste, and generally bullying each other.

episodes.title: Metric Messiah
episodes.description: The group talks about how spoons are mugs, how many dogs equal a horse, and disney princesses reimagined as cement mixers.

episodes.title: The Tech Talk
episodes.description: The group talks about working in retail, new technology, and strange interactions with customers.
